channel.title: micro blogging on Rabble-rousing Rambling
channel.description: Recent content in micro blogging on Rabble-rousing Rambling

item.title: Google blogs its feature later than I do!
item.description: I discovered today, that twitter+zooomr+a small utility called Cropper, now allows us to put new information about some of the products we use often, out into the blogosphere (I hate that word now), faster than ever before. Check this image that I posted this image on zooomr on 12th Dec and then twittered it. I found a blog post, by (I presume) one of the engineer’s who made it happen, on the google’s official blog.
